title: The Bachelor's Brittany Hockley flaunts washboard abs in tiny string bikini
text:
She shot to fame after being brutally dumped by Nick Cummins during the dramatic Bachelor finale last year.

But a year on, and Brittany Hockley is showing no signs of heartache - instead showing the 'Honey Badger' just what he's missed out on her jaw-dropping Instagram page.

On Friday, the gorgeous brunette, 31, posted a sexy photo flaunting her washboard abs and ample assets in a tiny string bikini during a trip to Mexico.

Bringing the heat! Brittany Hockley (pictured) looked nothing short of sensational in the sassy white two-piece, which showed off her tiny waist and muscular arms to perfection.

Brittany looked nothing short of sensational in the sassy white two-piece, which showed off her tiny waist and muscular arms to perfection.

'Well, Almost time to go back to the real world, where you have to wear clothes and eating tacos and daiquiris before midday is unacceptable,' she captioned the sultry shot.

'What sort of a world is that?'

'It wasn't his cup of tea': The Bachelor star Brittany Hockley said that Nick Cummins (right) is trying to 'distance himself' from his time on the series

Back in August, Brittany revealed she had an awkward run-in with the curly-haired Lothario after happened after the show aired.

'I only ran into him once at an event,' she told WHO magazine.

'We both just moved on but he really wanted to distance himself from the franchise,'

Public scrutiny: Nick suffered immense backlash for dumping both finalists during the last season's finale of The Bachelor

Nick suffered immense backlash for dumping both finalists during the last season's finale of The Bachelor.

He had faced public scrutiny after he failed to pick either finalist, Hockley or Sophie Tieman, during the shock finale.

The keen fisherman has largely kept a low profile since the show aired, spending some time overseas and walking The Kokoda Track.
description: She shot to fame after being brutally dumped by Nick Cummins on the drammatic Bachelor finale last year.
authors: Nicole Douglas For Daily Mail Australia
